description:
Google's Treasury team is on a mission to optimize the return on Google's financial assets. As a member of this team, you're always looking for innovative ways to help Google invest for the future while limiting volatility and material surprises. In addition to risk busting and asset management, you work collaboratively to administer business insurance programs and stock programs, and provide financial analysis support to our internal teams. You make creative yet calculated decisions that are backed by both experience and your extensive knowledge of the economy and financial industry.

As a Treasury Operations Analyst, you will help support our growing corporate Treasury Operations function. The role will include oversight of daily operational support across the Treasury landscape. Primary responsibilities will entail trade support for the Portfolio Management and FX team, third party vendor management, and support for systems implementation and integration. You want to excel in a high growth environment and are eager to take on increasing levels of responsibility. You are a quick learner, highly organized with attention to detail, and someone who can adapt to quickly changing environments. You are also skilled at communicating complex problems to senior stakeholders.

The name Google came from "googol," a mathematical term for the number 1 followed by 100 zeros. And nobody at Google loves big numbers like the Finance team when providing in depth analysis on all manner of strategic decisions across Google products. From developing forward-thinking analysis to generating management reports to scaling our automated financial processes, the Finance organization is an important partner and advisor to the business.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 2 years of experience in a corporate treasury or investment banking operations team or related experience
  • Experience in a risk, collateral management, and middle office or trade support role

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with FXall, CLS, Bloomberg, Blackrock Aladdin, OMGEO Products, Quantum, Reval
  • Working knowledge of spreadsheet software, SQL, Tableau, Google Apps Script
  • Strong understanding of beginning to end Fixed Income & FX transaction lifecycles
  • Proven ability to work in a cross-functional, fast-paced environment
  • Detail-oriented and collaborative team player with a positive attitude and sense of humor
  • Very strong analytical, verbal and written communication skills
responsibilities:
• Support the trading team to ensure all Alphabet trades are executed based on approval, trading limits, counterparty limits and matched with counterparties; daily position reconciliations across FX systems, and ensure adherence to regulatory requirements and oversee daily collateral management and assist in implementation of new ISDAs
  • Analyze, manage third-party vendors, and drive to completion open items as they relate to trading activity.
  • Conduct systems evaluation, implementation and integration to address changing operational needs
  • Provide middle office and risk support for FX hedging programs and fixed income products including trade allocation and confirmation, trade exceptions, DTC & FED settlements, and position and cash reconciliations
  • Support systems and operational setup of new entities, currencies, and trading counterparties and lend operational expertise to support strategic initiatives including definition of process, controls and associated system requirements
title: Treasury Operations Analyst
